name: fortinet-forticwp
label: Fortinet FortiCWP
description: Fortinet's FortiCWP integrates with APIs provided by cloud vendors including AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Platform to monitor and track all security components, including configurations, user activity, and traffic flow logs. This Connector automated operations such as retrieving the user account details from Fortinet FortiCWP, etc

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Fortinet FortiCWP API

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: FortiCWP Credential, follow this link to generate it https://docs.fortinet.com/document/forticwp/21.1.0/online-help/585481/generate-credential

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Account Severity Level
operations.description: Retrieves the severity level of each cloud service account from Fortinet FortiCWP.

operations.title: Get User Account Details
operations.description: Retrieves the user account details from Fortinet FortiCWP.

operations.title: Get Alert Severities
operations.description: Retrieves all the alert severities from Fortinet FortiCWP.

operations.title: Get Resource Map
operations.description: Retrieves the basic information for users and accounts from Fortinet FortiCWP.

operations.title: Get Alerts
operations.description: Retrieves alerts of all the accounts from Fortinet FortiCWP that are filtered based on the time range of the alerts you want to retrieve and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: start_time
parameters.tooltip: Select the Start DateTime from when you want to retrieve alerts (oldest alerts) from Fortinet FortiCWP.
parameters.description: Select the Start DateTime from when you want to retrieve alerts (oldest alerts) from Fortinet FortiCWP.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: end_time
parameters.tooltip: Select the End DateTime till when you want to retrieve alerts (most recent alerts) from Fortinet FortiCWP.
parameters.description: Select the End DateTime till when you want to retrieve alerts (most recent alerts) from Fortinet FortiCWP.

parameters.title: Records to Skip
parameters.name: skip
parameters.tooltip: Specify the first X records that you want to skip while retrieving alerts from Fortinet FortiCWP.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the first X records that you want to skip while retrieving alerts from Fortinet FortiCWP.

parameters.title: Limit Fetched Records To
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of records that you want this operation to fetch from Fortinet FortiCWP. The maximum number of records that can be retrieved is 1000.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of records that you want this operation to fetch from Fortinet FortiCWP. The maximum number of records that can be retrieved is 1000.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.name: alert_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the alert ID whose details you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiCWP.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the alert ID whose details you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiCWP.

parameters.title: User
parameters.name: alert_user
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify one or multiple users (CSV format if you are specifying multiple users) based on whom you want to retrieve alerts from Fortinet FortiCWP.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify one or multiple users (CSV format if you are specifying multiple users) based on whom you want to retrieve alerts from Fortinet FortiCWP.

parameters.title: Severity
parameters.name: severity
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify one or multiple severities (CSV format if you are specifying multiple severities) based on which you want to retrieve alerts from Fortinet FortiCWP.
parameters.tooltip: Specify one or multiple severities (CSV format if you are specifying multiple severities) based on which you want to retrieve alerts from Fortinet FortiCWP.

parameters.title: State
parameters.name: alert_state
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify one or multiple states (CSV format if you are specifying multiple states) based on which you want to retrieve alerts from Fortinet FortiCWP.
parameters.tooltip: Specify one or multiple states (CSV format if you are specifying multiple states) based on which you want to retrieve alerts from Fortinet FortiCWP.
